Hand Held Cannon.name: Hand Held Cannon
Hand Held Cannon.special: Unit base gets the option to fire this weapon instead of regular weapons.

Mechanical Power Spear.name: Mechanical Power Spear
Mechanical Power Spear.assault_special: When rolling regular damage, roll a d10 instead of a d6. \\ In addition units get +2 to damage (stacks with unit ability) \\ Roll a d6 in psycic damage

Mechanical Shield.name: Mechanical Shield
Mechanical Shield.special: Units gains damage resistance 1 \ Weapon uses 1 hand

Pyro.name: Pyro
Pyro.special: Choose one hex within range, and each memember tries to throw one grenade at an enemy in that hex. If enemy is hit atleast once, that enemy is set on fire. \\ Don't need to be loaded to be used.\\Bonus weapon, can be added to any other combination of weapons.\\

Ork Pistol.name: Ork Pistol
Ork Pistol.special: 1 handed weapon. Infantry may combine pistol with another 1-handed weapon.

Mechanical Spear.name: Mechanical Spear
Mechanical Spear.assault_special: Add +1 to damage (on top of units regular damage) \ Roll a d8 instead of a d6 for regular damage after assault\  Lastly, any unit base hit atleast once in melee take d4 in psycic damage\
Mechanical Spear.special: Units gains damage resistance 1 \ Weapon uses 1 hand

Heavy MG.name: Heavy MG
Heavy MG.special: Fire at all enemies within arch of fire and within range. Or,with the use of aim, fires 6 shots at same enemy in one shot. Loading this gun activates one entire salvo.

Steam MG.name: Steam MG
Steam MG.special: Fire at ALL units (friend or foe) within fireing angle and range. In addition, unit gain an adhoc entrenchemnt while setup.

Infantry.name: Infantry

Regular Damage: 6-8: kill 1 member, roll on psycic damage [d6]

Infantry.assault_special: Any 6 rolled in assault count as two.\\ In addition, you may reroll 1 die (assault or assault deflection) if you roll a 6 in assault. Repeat if you get more 6's
Infantry.unit_special: Bad shot: -1 to hit with ranged weapons. \\ May choose to fire before or after movement.

Troll.name: Troll

Regular Damage: 22-24: +4 for future damage, bleed[10], -1 (cumulative) on assault damage
25-27: +5 for future damage, bleed[12], -2 (cumulative) on assault damage
28-29: +10 for future damage, bleed[12], -4 (cumulative) on assault damage

Troll.assault_special: Reduce damage by 2 for each successfull assault deflection rolled by enemy
Troll.unit_special: May have a maxium of twelve -1 counters to assault damage, and 1 momentarily killed token\ At each aftermath face, remove/downgrade up to three of the following: one +1 for future damage marker, downgrade one bleeding one step, one -1 counter to assault damage or 1 momentarily killed token.\

grunt.name: grunt

Regular damage: 6-8: kill 1 member, roll on psycic damage[d6]

grunt.assault_special: Any 6 on assult die roll (not assault deflection) count as two success and you get to reroll 2 dice (identical rules to this die). (exploding die)

Warg Rider.name: Warg Rider

Regular damage: 6-8: kill 1 member, roll on psycic damage d[6]

Warg Rider.assault_special: Any 6 in assault counts as 2 success. \ In addition, reroll any 3 dice (assault or assault deflection by you) for each 6 you roll for assault. Repeat if you get another 6
Warg Rider.unit_special: May use crafts (both melee and ranges) which uses 1 hand. Fire orders only available if given ranged weapon

Halftrack.name: Halftrack

Critical damage: 5-6: unit gains +1 to be hit and -1 to hit.
Lightly damage: 5-6: Roll a d6 of regular damage to each transported unit base.
Regular Damage: 5-8: +1 on future damage, roll for critical damage[d6]

Halftrack.unit_special: Bad Shot (-1 to hit) \ Fires after movement\ May transport up to 2 grunts or 1 infantry.
